274-277: 1.8

06.10.2011

Most of these were taken with my new lens, the Nikkor 35mm f1.8, which was a really cool early birthday surprise from Steph. I might take a photo of it one day soon, which will probably make do for the 365, especially since I'm running out of ideas and pretty much anything will do now.
